biotools.summary: This flexible R package deals with the data generated by PerkinElmer's Opera High Content Screening System. Its functions include the data importing, normalization and quality control, hit detection and function analysis.

bioschemas.name: OperaMate
bioschemas.summary: This flexible R package deals with the data generated by PerkinElmer's Opera High Content Screening System. Its functions include the data importing, normalization and quality control, hit detection and function analysis.
